Name: Space Struck Run
About the game: What is Space Struck Run? Space Struck Run is a small game where you take control of Dectron The Cyborg, where you have to do your best to survive in outer space while the difficulty keeps rising. Avoid falling to the emptiness of space thanks to dectronâ€™s gravity boots, survive by jumping over the enemy ships! Features The difficulty will increase as the player survival score increases Deal with multiple obstacles such as explosive drones over the spaceships and asteroids. Use your energy shield to avoid getting killed by energy blasts and explosive drones. Steam leaderboards and achievements will come soon after release.
